Macklyn Arbuckle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macklyn_Arbuckle 0 Macklyn Arbuckle (July 9, 1866 – April 1, 1931) was an American screen and stage actor. He was the brother of actor Andrew Arbuckle and cousin of comedian Roscoe "Fatty" Arbuckle. Macklyn_Arbuckle ( July_9 , 1866 – April_1_,_1931 ) was an_American_screen_and_stage_actor . He was the_brother of actor_Andrew_Arbuckle and cousin of comedian_Roscoe_"_Fatty_"_Arbuckle .
